languages.text: "Драйвстем, вы же не обвиняете один из крупнейших домов Даргонуса в предательстве, не имея весомых доказательств, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "Драйвстем, вы же не обвиняте один из крупнейших домов Даргонуса в предательстве и саботаже, не имея весомых доказательств, верно?"

languages.text: "Drivestem, you aren't accusing one of Dargonus's leading noble houses of treason without airtight evidence, are you?"
languages.original_text: "Драйвстем, вы же не обвиняете один из крупнейших домов Даргонуса в предательстве, не имея весомых доказательств, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "Drivestem, you are not accusing one of the largest noble houses of Dargonus of treason without any tangible evidence, are you?"
"Drivestem, you are not accusing one of the largest noble houses of Dargonus of treason without any tangible evidence, are you?"
"Drivestem, you are not accusing one of the largest noble houses of Dargonus of treason without airtight evidence, are you?"
"Drivestem, you are not accusing one of the largest noble houses of Dargonus of treason without airtight evidence, are you?"
"Drivestem, you aren't accusing one of Dargonus's leading noble houses of treason without airtight evidence, are you?"
"Drivestem, you aren't accusing one of Dargonus's leading noble houses of treason without airtight evidence, are you?"

languages.text: 「ドライブステン。まさか、確たる証拠もなしに、ダルゴナス有数の貴族家を反逆罪で訴えたりはしないよな？」
languages.original_text: "Drivestem, you aren't accusing one of Dargonus's leading noble houses of treason without airtight evidence, are you?"

traits.locale_text: 「ドライブステン。まさか、確たる証拠もなしに、ダルゴナス有数の貴族家を反逆罪で訴えたりはしないよな？」

languages.text: “德莱夫斯塔，你既然敢指责达戈努斯几大贵族之一叛国，那你肯定有明确证据吧？”
languages.original_text: "Drivestem, you aren't accusing one of Dargonus's leading noble houses of treason without airtight evidence, are you?"

traits.locale_text: “德莱夫斯塔，你既然敢指责达戈努斯几大贵族之一叛国，我猜你肯定有明确证据吧？”

languages.text: « Drivestem, seriez-vous en train d'accuser l'une des plus grandes maisons de Dargonus de trahison ? J'espère que vous avez des preuves en rocbéton armé. »
languages.original_text: "Drivestem, you aren't accusing one of Dargonus's leading noble houses of treason without airtight evidence, are you?"

traits.locale_text: « Drivestem, seriez-vous en train d'accuser l'une des plus grandes maisons de Dargonus de trahison ? J'espère que vous avez des preuves en rocbéton armé. »

languages.text: «Drivestem, ¿acaso está acusando de traición a una de las casas nobles más grandes de Dargonus sin pruebas irrefutables?».
languages.original_text: "Drivestem, you aren't accusing one of Dargonus's leading noble houses of treason without airtight evidence, are you?"

traits.locale_text: «Drivestem, ¿acaso está acusando de traición a una de las casas nobles más grandes de Dargonus sin pruebas irrefutables?».

languages.text: "Drivestem, Ihr beschuldigt doch gewiss nicht eines der größten Adelshäuser von Dargonus ohne hieb- und stichfeste Beweise des Hochverrats, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "Drivestem, you aren't accusing one of Dargonus's leading noble houses of treason without airtight evidence, are you?"

traits.locale_text: "Drivestem, Ihr beschuldigt doch gewiss nicht eines der größten Adelshäuser von Dargonus ohne hieb- und stichfeste Beweise des Hochverrats, nicht wahr?"

languages.text: "Drivestem, Dargonus'un önde gelen hanelerini elinde sugötürmez deliller olmaksızın ihanetle mi suçluyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Drivestem, you aren't accusing one of Dargonus's leading noble houses of treason without airtight evidence, are you?"

traits.locale_text: "Drivestem, Dargonus'un önde gelen hanelerini elinde sugötürmez deliller olmadan ihanetle mi suçluyorsun?"
